name: AddConstantTo
doc: Add a constont to an image. The result is cast to the type of the input

additional_template_types.type:
typename itk::simple::Conditional< std::tr1::is_same<
    typename InputImageType::PixelType, std::complex<float> >::value, float, double>::Type

members.name: Constant
members.doc: The constant to add to the input image
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the constant that will be used to multiply all the image pixels

briefdescription: Add a constant to all input pixels.
detaileddescription:
This filter is templated over the input image type and the output image type.
\author Tom Vercauteren, INRIA & Mauna Kea Technologies
Based on filters from the Insight Journal paper:http://hdl.handle.net/1926/510
\see  UnaryFunctorImageFilter
\li {ImageProcessing/AddConstantToImageFilter,Add a constant to every pixel in an image}
